name: Chapter 15: A World Transformed
short_description: Sarah activates the harmonizing device, risking everything. The magical world is transformed as technology and magic find a perfect balance. In the process, Sarah finds that she can now bridge both worlds, allowing her to live in and contribute to both realities. The story ends with Sarah starting a new magi-tech academy that welcomes students from both worlds, ushering in an era of unprecedented magical and technological advancement.
events: Activation of the device, world transformation, establishment of the new academy
people: Sarah, citizens of both worlds, new academy students
places: Transformed magical world, Sarah's original world, new magi-tech academy
from_prev_chapter: Activation of the harmonizing device and its consequences
